replies.body:
I cant login either, it says;

connection failure: unable to connect to pvp.net server. 
information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here. 

(I did try to click on it but no webpage popped up... I tried several million times, I spammed it :3) 

It also says service availability can be viewed on the League Of Legends server status webpage. buuut I cant find it, I probably haven't found it but while I look for it can someone please help me, I wanna play some league :'(

I just found the server status webpage thingy and it didn't help because it said that it isn't supported with my region.

p.s. this is completely off topic but I am so dumb... like it literally took me 10 minutes to figure out how to spell region.
Yeah, it's server-sided. I actually did manage to log on but it took a few minutes.

I can't log in as well, or having really hard time trying to log in.
I was in ranked champ select when the countdown went down to 0 and stayed there, and been trying to log in for the past 15 minutes.
Finally got in I think. Try the fix in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=clGi6TIedyM
Not sure but I can't login either.
